title: Add a visible “Buy” entry point for shopping

requirements.text: Add a clearly labeled “Buy” entry point in the main navigation so users can easily access the shopping/browsing experience (route to /products), and ensure it is visible for both authenticated and unauthenticated users on desktop and mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop header shows a “Buy” navigation item that routes to “/products”.
Mobile navigation provides a visible “Buy” entry point that routes to “/products” (either in the left menu, the quick-links row, or both).
The “Buy” entry is visible even when the user is not signed in.
All user-facing text added/updated for this change is in English.
No existing routes are removed or renamed; “/products” remains the shopping destination.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only Shadcn components must be composed, not edited).
Do not edit immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change backend APIs, state, or data models for this request.
Do not add payments or external checkout providers.
